name: Color # Change
description:
Color # Change is a challenging platfomer game where you change your color by jumping through portals which allows you to land on different colored platforms!

Color # Change was developed for Mini Jam #62 in which the theme was colors and limitation was that animations can have maximum of 2 frames.

For maximum smoothness I recommend downloading the game and playing it locally on your PC but you can also play it on your browser.

Controls:

A/D or Arrow keys to move the character.

Spacebar or Control to jump.

Shift to dash.

M to mute music.
